trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes an operation on a separate thread.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the application has requested cancellation of a background operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if the application has requested cancellation of a background operation; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when the background operation has completed, has been canceled, or has raised an exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Requests cancellation of a pending background operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The percentage, from 0 to 100, of the background operation that is complete.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxx 0 xx 000$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The percentage, from 0 to 100, of the background operation that is complete.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxx 0 xx 000$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
